item.description:
The main focus of this meetup is to prepare for the two week tour with Mike Berger and his film, IMPROBABLE COLLAPSE: The Demolition of Our Republic. This tour opens April 10, 2007, when Michael Berger presents his film at the University of Hartford, with Q & A following. The 69-minute film documentary examines the startling events of September 11, 2001 from a scientific perspective.

On Wednesday, April 11, Valley 9/11 Truth will present this film in Northampton at First Churches. Please link and download posters for this event; for a black and white flyer, see:
www.911truth.org/images/resources/Poster%20bw-Northampton%20MA.pdf
For a color poster, see:
www.911truth.org/images/resources/Poster%20color-Northampton%20MA.pdf

More information on this tour can be found at FlybyNews.com and the 911Truth.org -- Calendar. Please help promote this tour and events to raise consciousness to stop false flag operations that jeopardize life everywhere.

Also at this next meetup, we will be planning a music benefit and promotional efforts for the tour. Resources will be available, and we may present a film called: "Dust and Deception at the World Trade Center." The impact of the environmental disaster after 911 will continue for years. The health of those who were exposed to the toxic dust and told that the "Air was safe to breathe" and the continuing coverup of the problems has not been adequately reported in the mainstream media. Those who were most affected are often the least able to get the help they need. In 911: Dust and Deceit at the WTC, Filmmaker Penny Little interviews numerous experts, victims, and ground zero workers.

Please RSVP and help bring as many people as possible to support Valley911Truth!

Please also note that Valley911Truth.org entered into your browser will take you to Valley 9/11 Truth meet-up page.

Please note March showings of David Ray Griffin's film from FlybyNews.com. On Tuesday March 13 there is also a community free meal at the Common Ground in Brattleboro, VT. Following the April 14 (Saturday night) showing of film with Mike Berger at the Hooker-Dunham Theater, Brattleboro 9/11 Truth are planning monthly events/meetings. Also March 15 in Keene, which this March 7, Scott Ritter is speaking at KSC Mabel Brown Auditorium in the Student Center. Please join us in distributing literature on upcoming 9/11 events.
